• Intro
  • Journey
  • Present
  • Future
  • Past

Zyok , Created by Gaea, is one of her earliest creations tasked with the mission of helping to maintain the balance. He promotes positive energy where it rises and roots out negative energy.

The Journey

Past

The earliest forms of civilization when humans were more in tune with the Earth while achieving great technological advances

Present

A few hundred years ahead of where Earth is today. Almost everything has been stripped away while humans rely primarily on technology

Future

Thousands of years down the line when the planet is slowly healing. The civilization that remains focuses much of their effort on restoration

Each Timeline Represents a Unique Type of Sound

The Present

Our journey will begin in the present and end in the past. It is currently the year 2448 and society is hanging on by a thread. The level of disparity between the elite and common class is nothing like we've ever seen.

Awoken

Zyok has rested for a long time only to wake up in a world far from the one he remembered. Most of the humans are cold and lifeless as opposed to the ones from his memories.

The Future

The year 5688 and society is in a whole new chapter where people are beginning to respect each other and the planet.

Restoration

Zyok has watched his mother, Gaea, go through so many changes but has not heard her voice for the last few thousand years. With that he's made it his personal mission to restore her to a stable condition.

The Past

The year is unknown to our records, a time long before any of our records. The humans back then were much different than the ones we know today with technology unlike our own.

Initialization

Zyok is old relative to any human but is an infant in his own timeline. There's plenty left to him to learn and emotions to experience
